segments.text: Excuse me , but do you have this T-shirt in size L ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry . We're out of size L's .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Too bad . I really like it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you try this other T-shirt ? I think it would look nice on you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have it in size L ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's on your right hand side at the end of this hallway .
segments.speaker: S2
